statements: SELECT * FROM water_conservation_technologies;
SELECT technology_name, impact_on_reduction FROM water_conservation_technologies;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_technologies WHERE impact_on_reduction > 0;
SELECT technology_id, technology_name FROM water_conservation_technologies ORDER BY technology_name DESC;
SELECT technology_name, description FROM water_conservation_technologies LIMIT 2 OFFSET 1;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_technologies ORDER BY technology_id DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT technology_name, impact_on_reduction FROM water_conservation_technologies WHERE impact_on_reduction > 0.5
SELECT technology_name, description FROM water_conservation_technologies WHERE description ILIKE '%efficient%'
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_technologies ORDER BY technology_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT technology_name, impact_on_reduction FROM water_conservation_technologies WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM technologies;
SELECT technology_name, description FROM technologies WHERE usage_reduction > 0;
SELECT org_name, location, contact_person FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name ASC;
SELECT technology_name, usage_reduction FROM technologies WHERE technology_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT technology_name, description FROM technologies WHERE technology_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY technology_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM technologies WHERE technology_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY technology_id DESC;
SELECT technology_name, description FROM technologies WHERE usage_reduction >= 10 ORDER BY technology_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE location = 'New York' AND org_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY org_id ASC;
SELECT org_name, contact_person FROM organizations WHERE LENGTH(contact_person) > 10 ORDER BY org_id DESC;
SELECT technology_name, usage_reduction FROM technologies WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY usage_reduction DESC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Saving_Technologies;
SELECT technology_name, water_savings FROM Water_Saving_Technologies;
SELECT user_name, organization FROM Users;
SELECT technology_name, description FROM Water_Saving_Technologies WHERE water_savings > 0.5;
SELECT user_name, user_email, organization FROM Users WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT technology_name, description, water_savings FROM Water_Saving_Technologies;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE organization = 'Company A';
SELECT technology_name, amount_saved FROM Water_Saving_Technologies JOIN Usage_Reduction ON Water_Saving_Technologies.technology_id = Usage_Reduction.technology_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT organization FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM WaterTech;
SELECT tech_id, tech_name FROM WaterTech WHERE tech_name = 'Reverse Osmosis';
SELECT org_name, location, contact_email FROM Organization WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT impact_measure, value FROM ImpactMetrics WHERE value > 100;
SELECT tech_name, description, usage_reduction FROM WaterTech WHERE usage_reduction IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM WaterTech;
SELECT tech_name, description, usage_reduction FROM WaterTech WHERE usage_reduction > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ImpactMetrics WHERE value >= 100 AND impact_measure = 'Environmental';
SELECT org_name, location, contact_email FROM Organization ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT wt.tech_name, tm.impact_measure FROM WaterTech wt JOIN ImpactMetrics tm ON wt.tech_id = tm.tech_id WHERE tm.value <= 500;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationOrganization;
SELECT organization_name, contact_email FROM WaterConservationOrganization WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WaterSavingTechnologies;
SELECT technology_name, description FROM WaterSavingTechnologies ORDER BY technology_name DESC;
SELECT organization_name, total_gallons_saved FROM WaterConservationOrganization JOIN OrganizationsStats ON WaterConservationOrganization.id = OrganizationsStats.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationOrganization;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM WaterConservationOrganization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT technology_name, description FROM WaterSavingTechnologies WHERE organization_id = 2 ORDER BY technology_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM UserFeedback WHERE technology_id = 3 AND feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT organization_id, SUM(total_gallons_saved) AS total_saved_gallons FROM OrganizationsStats GROUP BY organization_id HAVING total_technologies_used > 1;
